name: Linked (itch) (EdwardBonnett)
description:
A unique dual controlled action arcade game created for the GMTK 2021 game jam in 48 hours - get the highest score you can!

Collect blue dots with your blue orb, yellow dots with your yellow orb and purple dots and dashes with your chain. Be careful not hit the yellow and blue dots with your chain as it will break!

WASD to move the yellow orb

Arrow keys to move the blue orb

Play with two players or by yourself!

Music: Nightchaser by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
